node.page:
[% linkNode $$NODE{author_user}; %] has asked for the wisdom of the Perl Monks concerning the following question: [{votehead}] [{voteit}]

[{parselinks:doctext}]

[{shownote}] [{votefoot}] [{addnewform:note,Offer an answer,Your answer,$$NODE{title},getId($NODE)}] go to [% linkNodeTitle('Seekers of Perl Wisdom',$NODE); %]
node.title: testquestion display page
